price: (Tola isaatiin) karaa qajeelaa ibsuun Rabbuma irra jira. Ishee irraa jallaatu jira. (Rabbiin) odoo fedhee hunda keessan isin qajeelcha ture.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ قَصۡدُ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا جَآئِرٞۚ وَلَوۡ شَآءَ لَهَدَىٰكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā al-lahi qaṣdu al-sabīli wamin'hā jāirun walaw shāa lahadākum ajmaʿīna
translations: surely He would have guided you
